roleset.name: put a stop to, temporarily, temporarily halt a process
roleset.note: SUSPEND-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. No VNcls. (from suspend.01-v)
SUSPENSION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on suspend-v.01. No corresponding VNcls. (from suspension.01-n)

roles.note: arg3-instrument omitted (in comparison to the verbal frame). (from suspension.01-n)

example.name: boring transitive
example.text: Big Board Chairman John Phelan said yesterday that he could support letting federal regulators suspend program trading during wild stock-price swings.

example.name: one kind of secondary predication
example.text: The market also moved at early afternoon on news that [Jaguar shares]-1 were being temporarily suspended *trace*-1 at 746 pence ($ 11.80) each.

example.name: different kind of secondary predication
example.text: Before [its shares]-1 were suspended *trace*-1 from trading, Qintex Australia plunged to 16 Australian cents (12 U.S. cents) a share yesterday from 33 Australian cents Friday.

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: we are willing to sit down and negotiate with the Iranians assuming and contingent upon their suspension of their nuclear activities at their plant in the in Iran /.
example.arg: at their plant in the in Iran

example.name: just arg1
example.text: A White House spokesman condemned the truce suspension as `` deplorable ''

example.name: arg 1
example.text: the board of Cyberes has requested the suspension of shares from trading on Aim.

roleset.name: hang
roleset.note: SUSPEND-V NOTES: Member of VNcls put_spatial-9.2-1. (from suspend.02-v)
SUSPENSION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on suspend-v.02. Corresponds to VNcls put_spatial-9.2-1. (from suspension.02-n)

role.descr: agent, entity causing something to be suspended

example.name: didn't actually occur
example.text: John suspended the Christmas decorations from the ceiling.

example.name: just arg 2
example.text: Other ceiling joists are supported at their ends by the walls and at intermediate points by suspension from the rafters.

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: The suspension of ropes on supporting wires is accomplished from a mobile platform.

roleset.name: receive a punitive suspension
roleset.note: SUSPENSION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on nominal usage-- comparison to fire.02. Corresponds to VNcls fire-10.10. (from suspension.03-n)

role.descr: entity getting suspended (might be a person, or their license, etc)

example.name: just arg 3
example.text: His punishment , suspension for using a corked bat for use -- which is illegal during a game
example.arg: for using a corked bat for use-- which is illegal during a game

example.name: arg1 as a license, not just a person
example.text: As part of the deal Mr. Clinton will accept the suspension of his law license in Arkansas for five years
example.arg: of his law license in Arkansas

example.name: args1 and 2
example.text: ... shall result in a short-term suspension of the student from the school system

example.name: another kind of arg2
example.text: Suspension of the student from attending classes for a period not exceeding 14 days
example.arg: for a period not exceeding 14 days
